law.text:
As used in this section and KRS 434.442, unless the context otherwise requires:
"Educational institutions" means those schools providing postsecondary education including technical, community and junior colleges, and colleges and universities;
"Governmental agency" means any agency of the state or local government; and
"Secondary school" means a school with grades nine (9) through twelve (12).
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996.
